summary: This is an email from attorney Brittany Henderson to an unspecified recipient, likely a prosecutor or investigator, offering to arrange interviews with four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein who are ready to speak about their experiences. The email notes all four will be at a victim briefing in New York on October 23, 2019, and requests meetings on October 23 or 24.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Attorney representing additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein, reaching out to schedule victim interviews with the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator against whom the victims have experiences; central subject of the case.

connections.description: Henderson is an attorney representing victims who allege experiences with Epstein.

events.title: Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: A victim briefing is scheduled in New York where four additional victims represented by Brittany Henderson will be present.

locations: 425 North Andrews Avenue, Suite 2, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301
keyFacts: Four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein are ready to speak about their experiences and are represented by attorney Brittany Henderson.
All four victims will be present at a victim briefing in New York on October 23, 2019.
The attorney is requesting to schedule meetings with the recipient (likely a prosecutor/investigator) on October 23 or 24, 2019, for victim interviews.
The correspondence indicates ongoing efforts to gather victim testimony in the Epstein case as of October 2019.
